    • Uses of ApplicationContextConfigurer in com.foreach.across.core.context

      Methods in com.foreach.across.core.context that return types with arguments of type ApplicationContextConfigurer 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Collection<ApplicationContextConfigurer> AcrossContextUtils.getApplicationContextConfigurers(AcrossContext context)
      Will list all ApplicationContextConfigurers to apply for the AcrossContext itself.
      static Collection<ApplicationContextConfigurer> AcrossContextUtils.getApplicationContextConfigurers(AcrossContext context, AcrossModule module)
      Will list all ApplicationContextConfigurers in the module, combined with the ones registered on the AcrossContext that are specified to apply to all modules.
      static Collection<ApplicationContextConfigurer> AcrossContextUtils.getInstallerContextConfigurers(AcrossModule module)
      Will list all ApplicationContextConfigurers to be added to an installer context for the module, along with all properties that should be registered.

    • Uses of ApplicationContextConfigurer in com.foreach.across.core.context.configurer

      Classes in com.foreach.across.core.context.configurer that implement ApplicationContextConfigurer 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AnnotatedClassConfigurer
      Simple implementation for specifying annotated classes an ApplicationContext should register.
      class  ApplicationContextConfigurerAdapter
      Adapter class that implements the ApplicationContextConfigurer interface.
      class  ComponentScanConfigurer
      Simple implementation for specifying packages an ApplicationContext should scan.
      class  PostProcessorConfigurer
      Simple implementation for adding BeanFactoryPostProcessors to an ApplicationContext.
      class  PropertyPlaceholderSupportConfigurer
      Enables property placeholder support in the application context, by creating a default PropertySourcesPlaceholderConfigurer.
      class  PropertySourcesConfigurer 
      class  ProvidedBeansConfigurer
      Allows specifying a ProvidedBeansMap to provide to an ApplicationContext.
      class  SingletonBeanConfigurer
      Simple configurer to provide a singleton bean.
